argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description:
.T. = Index is valid.
.F. = Index is corrupt.

argument.name: tablename
argument.description: The name of the table owning the indexes you wish to check.

page.description: Checks the integrity of index tags for a specified table.
page.discussion: The CHECK_INDEXES_FOR_TABLE() function checks the integrity of the indexes of a table.
